Item.name: Connoisseur
Item.description: Once per turn, you can change your direction to any other direction available during any phase except Movement Phase. You have N uses.

Item.name: Cured
Item.description: You cannot receive any negative status effect and lose the ones you have.

Item.name: Flying
Item.description: You cannot be attacked by normal attacks and your movement does not count as stepping.
Item.troubleshooting: cannot pass through illegal zones for this Character (Ex. Viking cannot step Radioactive Zones). Can still be affected by abilities or effects that are not attacks (Ex. Paralysis, Slowness, etc).

Item.name: Divine Protection
Item.description: You cannot die nor lose stocks by any means.

Item.name: Invisible
Item.description: You cannot be attacked by normal attacks.
Item.troubleshooting: Can still be affected by abilities or effects that are not attacks (Ex. Paralysis, Slowness, etc).

Item.name: Quickness
Item.description: Your movement is increased by N.
Item.troubleshooting: Effects applies after rolling and before moving.

Item.name: Buried
Item.description: Petrification and Nonexistent

Item.name: Nonexistent
Item.description: You cannot be affected by anything and you cannot affect anyone with anything as well. You can only roll dice and move through legal paths, cannot activate anything.
Item.troubleshooting: Is like Flying, but you cannot also be affected by any ability, event, shenaningan, etc. (Not even automatic PP gain) and vice versa

Item.name: Paralysis
Item.description: You cannot move. You can still activate abilities or cards.

Item.name: Petrification
Item.description: Skip your turn completely.

Item.name: Wounded
Item.description: You cannot receive any positive status effect and lose the ones you have.

Item.name: Slowness
Item.description: Your movement is decreased by N, to a minimum of 1.
Item.troubleshooting: Effects applies after rolling and before moving.

Item.name: Threatened
Item.description: Ignore your dice roll value for movement, instead, your total movement is N.

Item.name: Fear
Item.description: You cannot kill any Character by any means. Can still kill Weakling Zombies.

Item.name: Disabled
Item.description: You cannot use any of your X abilities.

Item.name: Disruption
Item.description: Disabled(passive) + Disabled(active)

Item.name: Sickness
Item.description: You cannot draw, activate or discard any card.

Item.name: Blessed
Item.description: You cannot take any further Curse cards.

Item.name: Blocker
Item.description: Zombies cannot attack you, pass through you or land in the same Space as you.

Item.name: Good Luck
Item.description: Any card space you land on is treated as if it was a Blessing space.

Item.name: Hiker
Item.description: The size of your Inventory increases by N.
Item.troubleshooting: If you lose this effect, cards in the extra spots are discarded automatically.

Item.name: Instinct
Item.description: You can kill opposing Zombies. (RangeType(N))

Item.name: Sneaky
Item.description: You can only be attacked by Zombies if they land in the same space as you.

Item.name: Bad Luck
Item.description: Any card space you land on is treated as if it was a Curse space.

Item.name: Butterfingers
Item.description: You cannot equip any (X||Y||Z) weapon. Discard any equipment of that type that you currently have equipped.
Item.troubleshooting: Melee, Bows or Shields. (Ex. Butterfingers(Melee, Bows): cannot equip Melee or Bows.

Item.name: Cursed
Item.description: You cannot take any further Blessings.

Item.name: Exposed
Item.description: Your hurtbox for Zombie attacks range is increased by N.

Item.name: Gambler Luck
Item.description: Any card space you land on is treated as if it was a Random Card Space.

Item.name: Nervousness
Item.description: You cannot pass through Non-Weakling Zombies or land in the same Space as them.

Item.name: More Fear
Item.description: You have Fear but additionally you cannot kill Weakling Zombies.

Item.name: Aggression
Item.description: Your range increases by N.

Item.name: Flexible
Item.description: Other Zombies can pass through you or land in the same Space as you.
Item.troubleshooting: Can pass through other Zombies or land in the same Space as them.

Item.name: Unstoppable
Item.description: Can pass through other Zombies or land in the same Space as them.

Item.name: Intimidating
Item.description: Vikings cannot pass through you or land in the same Space as you.

Item.name: Radical
Item.description: Increase the amount of RP gained by Radioactive Zones by N.

Item.name: Allergic
Item.description: You do not gain RP from Radioactive Zones.
